message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to both parties. I understand its worth to you stands at $1,000,000, and I am confident it will bring significant benefits to your endeavors. To ensure we reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose a price of $950,000 for this exceptional item. This offer allows for a 5% discount while still providing a substantial return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate a transaction that meets our respective needs.
